name: Block Breaking Puzzle
description:
With over 100 hand crafted puzzles, Block Breaking Puzzle takes you on a mind-twisting journey that combines logic and problem-solving. Simply move the blocks to fill up the square to clear the level! Like all great puzzles, Block Breaking Puzzle will keep you entertained for just a moment, or will keep you engaged for hours of fun.

Game Features:
- Easy to learn, and fun to master gameplay
- Fun, colorful and engaging graphics
- Hundreds of unique levels and more to come
